website_summaries.verdict: An alternative to liquid oils to season your cast iron cookware with both some nice benefits and some concerns.
pros: Puck-shaped and easy to use, this product stands out for its unique, solid consistency
Affordable – 2 pucks per tin will last for up to 150 applications
Formulated with beeswax as well as palm and soybean oils
cons: Tends to leave behind a slight odor that some users may not like

customer_reviews.title: Finally found something that works!
customer_reviews.text: I've used every known "stuff" for seasoning cookware for over 40 years and thought I knew it all. That was until I bought a carbon steel pan and was about to throw it out. I tried bacon grease, crisco, coconut oil, flaxseed oil, a combination of, and still had sticking issues. Decided to try Crisbee Puck and after 5 or 6 seasonings, it is now as it should be. Eggs and/or cheese do not stick. Made Shrimp Scampi tonight and cleanup was a sponge and warm water. The tin stays on the counter now as it's the only thing I'll use. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sopchoppy

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron Seasoning Made Easy!
customer_reviews.text: My only regret in buying this product is that I didn't buy it sooner! It gave a nice even seasoning coating to all my cast Iron cookware. It was so easy to apply & season my cookware using the Crisbee puck. Also, their customer service is top notch and their website & FB page are great support as well should you need it. The search for the best, easiest way to care for your cast iron is over --- get Crisbee puck (or stick) today!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R.

customer_reviews.title: Smokes up the house but my cast iron looks like black glass
customer_reviews.text: This works well but I prefer the results achieved using grape seed oil at 485 degrees. Smokes up the house but my cast iron looks like black glass.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Will always have this on hand
customer_reviews.text: Used as directed, it puts an impressive sheen on my Lodge products. Grilled cheese and cheese omelets do not stick at all, slides out like teflon. simple to use, especially maintaining the original seasoning.
customer_reviews.author: CB at DC

customer_reviews.title: Easy fool proof way to season and maintain your cast iron cookware
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! I tried using extra virgin olive oil and seasoning three different times with so, so results. I then used Crisbee Puck as directed - what a difference. It gave my skillet a wonderful bronze glow leaving it smooth and slick the very fist time. I seasoned it once more and was completely satisfied with the color. Thankyou Crisbee Puck for such a wonderful product. Russ in GA
customer_reviews.author: Russell H. Kvistad

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I started using cast iron in early 2018 and spent a year trying to get my skillets seasoned well ( with Crisco) to no avail. I finally ordered your crisbee and I have seen a big difference already in a little over a month. I am finally getting a season on them to be proud of and that nice shiny look to the cooking surface. I absolutely will be recommending crisbee to everyone that I hear of that uses cast iron. Thank you for such a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use from can, seasons well for new seasoning and ongoing maintenance. For new seasoning I could see the point in considering one of the scented versions as my wife dislikes the “burning oil” smell, but that comes with any seasoning product I’ve tried. I didn’t notice performance or results being any better than other products such as grape seed or similar oils.
customer_reviews.author: N.R.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as someone claimed it was fabulous to season their new blackstone grill. We bought one and tried it, and it burned and stuck to the griddle top, and now it looks horrible. Maybe we did it wrong, but, for the high price of this, I really wish we'd had a better experience with this. I had to heat it up over and over and over to try and scrape the residue off this left.
customer_reviews.author: Green Eyed Girl

customer_reviews.title: Short Changed
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Crisbee for several year and absolutely love the product for my cast iron and carbon steel pans. Price has ranged from $14 to $17. Each time I received TWO pucks in the can. My last order only had ONE puck. Crisbee sold me ONE puck and charged me the price of TWO. I will keep my ONE puck but next time will buy their competitor.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product !
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to try this for a while however the price would stop me because it seems a little much for what you get. I went ahead and purchased the product and have been amazed by the results. I have not seasoned a brand new pan as of yet but some of my older ones are already looking and cooking better. I just wish the puck was on Amazon Prime so I could get it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Use this on a Solidteknic pan. Did an awesome job of seasoning. Follow directions and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Radio Operator

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, until you get to a small pick.
customer_reviews.text: I had been using bottled oil, but wanted to try this. The seasoning layer left by this product is much lighter than I previously got on my Lodge cast iron and De Buyer carbon steel. I do not season every day, but this seems to offer a better surface than I got before.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gorecki

customer_reviews.title: Nicely seasoned pan
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can season my cast iron pan. All of the oils I'd use would never work. Food was constantly stuck on the surface. This is what I needed to get my pan back to a usable state. It only took about 2 uses to get it back to an ok state. But daily use has made it so much better. Oils I used to use would smoke up the house when I put it in the oven and trip the smoke detectors. This didn't, but did have an odor. Not a bad thing, I don't think it is possible to do it without the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily seasoning after use
customer_reviews.text: Works great. When I get done using my cast iron I rinse it with hot water, warm it on the stove and apply a little of this oil. All my cast iron is very seasoned and nothing sticks. My only complaint is there are two individually wrapped pucks in the container which makes it awkward to store. Do I unwrap both, do I unwrap one and let the oil get all over the other wrapper? I wish it was just a tin full of oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions by preheating my skillets to 200F for 30 minutes and then lightly coating them before baking at 400F for 1 hour. The skillets were then cooled after the oven was turned off. Once done, they have a protective sheen that held up well to scrambled eggs. The coating works for cast iron, carbon steel pans and even my annodized aluminum Calphalon commercial skillet. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It works exactly like it's advertised. It made my new Lodge cook better than my old skillet that I've had for years. Definitely recommend this stuff! Also, their social media account is really helpful. They answer questions, and I really appreciated that they will tell you a little bit goes a long way! They could easily say to apply generously so they get more sales but they're an honest business and will tell you to use it sparingly. Can't say enough good things about my experience with Crisbee!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K

customer_reviews.title: It's really good stuff, but too expensive?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Crisco shortening to season cast iron and carbon steel pans, but with the great reviews, thought I'd try this. I ground down a Lodge pan (that needed re-seasoning) and the photos show the progress from zero to three seasoning sessions with Crisbee puck. Looks great and will update after using, BUT, is it really worth FOUR TIMES as much as Crisco shortening? Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry, Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Seasoning made easy
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of crisbee pucks. I strip vintage cast iron using a lye bath and using crisbee pucks is quick and easy. I appreciate the packaging and will not use anything else to season my vintage iron!! These pucks last quite a long time but depends how frequently you use your cast iron. When needed, I will purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Us

customer_reviews.title: More economical than the stick.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the roll up stick version of this for years. Very happy with the product itself, and my cast iron loves it. Decided to try this version as I figured it would be a little more cost effective. Figured it would be a little more messy, or hassle to use. Happy to report, it really isn’t any more hassle or mess than the stick. And it’s definitely more economical!
customer_reviews.author: Brenden Walker

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, I favor the pucks
customer_reviews.text: Crisbee in puck form is my favorite. Keeps all my cast Iron and carbon steel pans seasoned and free from rust. I recommend. I have used Crisbee in the roll on deodorant type container, and while it worked well, I think more value in the Pucks
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Works  Very Well
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for years and all my cast iron pans are on great shape. It doesn’t seem to build up too much because it only takes a tiny bit to coat the pans. I have tried everything from grape seed oil to crisco over the years but this works the best for me
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Nice convex weights that fit really well
customer_reviews.text: Nice convex-bottom weights that fit really well. Don't be distracted by the finger holder ones, these ones are easy to remove with a slight tip and maybe a knife or fork, and they're made in America. The bottom is nicely rounded (convex, ie outward, no bubbles will collect). No regrets so far, if I run into issues I'll update, but so far I am very happy to have purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Too busy to read the book ?  Buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tin. Easy to use. Instructions included are very clear, specific, and easy to follow. Finally I can use my cast iron with confidence. Always just toyed around with my skillet before I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Drilling III

customer_reviews.title: Joined the bandwagon but have some concerns...
customer_reviews.text: It does make my cast iron look great but I do have some concerns about using beeswax on my cast iron. What is the long term effects of applying wax to cast iron? Sure it makes it look shiny but wax? I've used it on a newly purchase lodge pan but I'm reluctant to use it on any of my Wagner or Griswold's at this point.
customer_reviews.author: SteveL

customer_reviews.title: As advertised so far
customer_reviews.text: I have learned to not just drop the puck in to a hot pan, because it melts pretty fast. Use on a warm pan first. I have only used this to condition my already seasoned pans and it seems to work pretty good. More reviews as I use it more
customer_reviews.author: 54fytng

customer_reviews.title: Keeps My Cast Iron Pan Perfectly Seasoned
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Please don't ever stop making! I use my cast iron pan All the time now! It's my go to nonstick pan, makes the best fried eggs. Your Frisbee puck made all the difference. It doesn't leave any funky tastes or residue, just Perfectly seasons the pan Everytime and I'm amazed how long each puck lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed after the hype
customer_reviews.text: Completely stripped 2 pans on self cleaning mode in oven. Did 3 rounds of treatment as instructed on the 2 old Lodge pans and a brand new Amazon Basics pre seasoned pan. Tested all 3 with olive oil and frying an egg. All three stuck. I gave 2 pans to my kids and kept one. I cooked Jimmy Dean sausage in my pan and all of the seasoning stripped away. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: alittlesteph

customer_reviews.title: Works Beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I still have an unused puck. I bought this one for a friend to give her daughter. Passing on good ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Fulco

customer_reviews.title: Must try
customer_reviews.text: Tried many different products to season my cast iron pans. So far I find this to be the best. Don't have any food sticking problems anymore and the pans look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: perry dipace

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cast iron seasoning I've used yet! I learned about it from reddit and will only use this on all my cast iron from now on.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Yankee fan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job and smells much better than flax when it reaches smoke point in the oven
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast, friendly service. I received my cast iron seasoning puck earlier today and have already seasoned my cast iron cookware. BEAUTIFUL! They are never going back in the cupboard again. They will either be in the oven, on the stove, or on display. Great Job Crisbee!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roy Evans

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Smell is nice,Does a great job.a little does the trick,Very Happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you cook with cast iron, you MUST season with Crisbee
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product from a fantastic company! They quickly responded to my questions and guided me through the entire process! I could not endorse something more. If you cook with cast iron, you MUST season with Crisbee.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick Bliss!
customer_reviews.text: Cast iron is the best non-stick cooking option when you have something like this! It's like owning a new tephlon pan without any of the health concerns. Great!
customer_reviews.author: MRC

customer_reviews.title: Obnoxious Smoke
customer_reviews.text: Product may well work as intended, however, since it filled the house with an obnoxious smoke odor while oven curing the cast iron for 1 hour at 400 degrees F (even while running the stovetop exhaust fan), which resulted in giving my wife a headache--it's not worth it. After throwing this $20 item in the trash, I proceeded to oven season my cast iron with canola oil at 480 degrees F with no ill effects reported from my wife. Perhaps the manufacturer should recommend only using when you can open your windows and freely ventilate the house?
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Dude

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works well! I use this for seasoning the cart iron. I use veg shortening after cleaning with salt for daily use. Really helps to ensure you get a nonstick surface.
customer_reviews.author: MsP

customer_reviews.title: Unmatched
customer_reviews.text: I will never use anything else again. Perfect. My cast iron acts like one of those commercial non-stick skillets thanks to this product.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to season my 22" Blackstone griddle top. I gave it 3 applications and it worked beautifully. I will never back to oil based products for seasoning.
customer_reviews.author: Fred M.

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron users rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. GREAT seasoning results! Ever has eggs stick to your #CastIron, even when you've seasoned it according to directions? I have, or at least HAD.. Crisbee Puck allowed the eggs, the cornbread and the Mash SLIDE out of the pan! WooHoo!! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: SusanS

customer_reviews.title: Nice dark seasoning easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for the first time on my dutch oven applied @ about 200F and then baked @ 400F for about an hour. gave me a nice dark seasoning that compared well with or maybe even a little nicer than flaxseed oil. Will add to this review once I've cooked in it for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Bill F

customer_reviews.title: This is the best for cast iron.
customer_reviews.text: It's ease of use. A little go's a long way. I have put 2 coats on my pans and will put on 2-3 more. It takes time with all the pans I have. Would recommend ++++++++++++.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. Makes my cast iron so easy to clean and use. No effort at all. A must have for anyone who enjoys cooking in cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Meowma

customer_reviews.title: Easy! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Product works as stated. The three times it took to season my pan (per instructions) worked WAY better than the weekend of trying with oil.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I love my Crisbee sticks!
customer_reviews.text: I also have the pucks for my larger cast irons surfaces. My main skillet stays on the stove and I get compliments on how beautiful it looks frequently and recommend this product to everyone I know who has cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E. Bock

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!
customer_reviews.text: The only product I use to season my cart iron!!! Going on 2 years with 1 tin!!! (2 pucks) I cook anything I can on my cast pots and pans and this product holds up 100%
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Has rescued two "ruined" cast iron pieces now in my regular rotation...
customer_reviews.text: I'm taking this down to my in-laws for thanksgiving, and am going to rescue some rusty cast iron of theirs too...
customer_reviews.author: J Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Seasoning
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome for seasoning pans use it everytime now recommend purchasing
customer_reviews.author: David Petersen

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff. works wonder. the only drawback is seasoning the pans is time intensive. crisbee puck is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: edgarallencrow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Seasoning New Cast Iron Pans
customer_reviews.text: I like the ingredients much better than lard. Very easy to apply and store.
customer_reviews.author: Flier

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I'll use again!
customer_reviews.text: I've been cooking in cast iron almost exclusively now for a few years. I absolutely love this product. The can comes with 2 pucks, and they last SO LONG, since you only have to use a little bit each time. Super easy to use, and makes my pans easier to clean than any other form of seasoning I have used in the past. I will continue to use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Abbott

customer_reviews.title: I love using this seasoning!
customer_reviews.text: Always leaves my pan shiny and slick. It would be easier to use the kind that comes in a stick, but you get more bang for your buck just buying the whole tub. It lasts a long time and is definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Crisbee
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my cast iron. Works great. Easy to use just warm up the pan let a little melt wipe off and you’re good to go
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Best seasoning ever!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent results! I've been seasoning with Crisco for years, but the shine I get with the Crisbee Puck is far superior. It's easy to use and has a much more pleasant fragrance while heating. I highly recommend the Crisbee Puck.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Cat

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: By far the best method for seasoning cast iron I've ever used. My cast iron looks great and food releases beautifully. Hands down, a necessity if you own CI.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Keeps my cast iron as good as new! We even got some old cast iron pans and use Crisbee on them and it brought them back to life! This is a Family owned business who goes above and beyond for their customers and it shows in their amazing products and awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m a Crisbee fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I’ve ever used for cast iron care.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Knott

customer_reviews.title: Nice Finish!
customer_reviews.text: It takes some time but if you will take the time to follow the specific instructions, you will get a very nice finish on your iron skillets/pots.
customer_reviews.author: Reda R. West

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So convenient, just follow the simple directions for a perfectly seasoned pan.
customer_reviews.author: K8

customer_reviews.title: Will keep using
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this product. So far so good on my cast iron pans.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne C

customer_reviews.title: Great but tricky to use
customer_reviews.text: Getting it out is easy. Getting it off the hot skillet is the tricky part. I always use more than intended because I struggle to get the puck of seasoning off the skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Best of all the rest!
customer_reviews.text: I am a cast iron user daily and have quite a collection, so I know first hand about maintaining and restoring cast iron. I must say, this is the best I have ever, ever used.
customer_reviews.author: speecherjack

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to season my Auz-Ion pan. 3 seasonings in the oven and then seasoned on the cooktop per Aus-Ion video. Fried an egg this morning and it slid all around the pan.
customer_reviews.author: McNystrom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Crisbee Pucks are the "bee's knees" when it comes to the seasoning and subsequent care of cast iron cookware. Easy to use, doesn't turn rancid like some oils when pans are stored for long periods of time between uses. Crisbee also works well for seasoning outdoor grill grates.
customer_reviews.author: DavejustDave

customer_reviews.title: 😉
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife. She loves it! When mama is happy...
customer_reviews.author: Ed Borges

customer_reviews.title: Great for carbon steel too!
customer_reviews.text: Not only good for cast iron, but also carbon steel pans.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I seasoned some of my cast iron with this and it is fantastic. So far, so great!
customer_reviews.author: QueenOPearls

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well, (so far.) The non-stick properties are the best I've experienced from cast iron seasoning and it's easier to apply than any other oil used for seasoning. The price could be better me thinks.
customer_reviews.author: Loose Black Horse

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for seasoning our cast iron and our outdoor flat top griddle. Good price. Will return when time to order more!

customer_reviews.title: Many uses.
customer_reviews.text: I use that stuff on cast iron pots and pans , flat-top griddle and my Wok I use that stuff on everything!

customer_reviews.title: This product worked wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: I ran my cast iron pans through the cleaning cycle of my oven. After that I followed the directions for the Crisbee Puck and my pans have never looked and worked so nicely. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Baum

customer_reviews.title: If you use cast iron cookware, you need this
customer_reviews.text: By far the best product I have used on cast iron. Follow the directions and start cooking. You won't regret it!

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Thiis product does exactly what it claims to do. And that's the best review you can get

customer_reviews.title: An easy to use cast iron seasoning
customer_reviews.text: An easy to use cast iron seasoning. Works great and I will be a repeat buyer for sure.My skillets are now non-stick treasures!
customer_reviews.author: Ben E. Woodham, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great on my Lodge griddle and skillet. They're both super slick and seasoning with Crisbee is sooo easy. Have already recommended to others and will continue to do so.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Ok but not any better than oil to justify cost

customer_reviews.text: I love this to season my cast iron. This is so easy to use. I love it.

customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works well. Simply follow the instructions or watch the informational videos and your pans should last several lifetimes.

customer_reviews.text: Great product love it , best stuff I’ve ever used.

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy with the Product
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff that actually does what it claims to do. A little goes a long way. Makes seasoning your pans fun (you know who you are!)

customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Each application seems to create a much better finish than the oils I was using.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but does take about 4 hours from start to finish to get a good seasoning on your grill. Worth every penny to keep that brown gunk off your grill area.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It did a fantastic job on my cast iron.

customer_reviews.text: Have used it four times on our fairly new Lodge Dutch Oven. I first used bacon but after the first use of the oven, I switched to Crisbee before next use and after subsequent oven uses, and the Crisbee is easy to use and makes the oven easier to clean after use.

customer_reviews.text: This is worth buying! I am glad i tried it, works so much better than anything else I've used

customer_reviews.title: Makes my pans super slick.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than olive oil that I used to use. I didn't realize that the puck was wrapped in plastic, so I was wondering why it didn't work at first, but I figured it out. Make sure to unwrap it. Ha-ha!

customer_reviews.title: Used it on a brand-new Lodge. After 4 cycles ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it on a brand-new Lodge. After 4 cycles following their instructions even bacon and eggs slide around in the skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Obrysii

product_meta.title: Crisbee Puck Cast Iron and Carbon Steel Seasoning - Family Made in USA - The Cast Iron Seasoning Oil & Conditioner Preferred by Experts - Maintain a Cleaner Non-Stick Skillet
product_meta.description: Crisbee Puck Cast Iron Seasoning - The Cast Iron Seasoning Oil & Conditioner Preferred by the Experts - Plant Based Oils With Beeswax. Family Made in the U.S.A. Very cost effective! Each Puck will treat a 10 inch skillet over 75 times when used as directed. Most cast iron seasoning oil products require 1/2 ounce (1 tbsp) per application. This means an 8 ounce bottle equals only 16 applications. Compare and save! Also works excellent on carbon steel cookware, griddle cooktops, wood cutting boards, wooden utensils, wood knife handles, & gun stocks. Our products will not turn rancid unlike vegetable shortening, flaxseed oil, coconut oil, or canola oil. Will help to develop a beautiful finish on all cast iron cookware. For tough to reach areas, melt a small amount and spread with a pastry or BBQ brush. Bonds to cast iron. Will not become a brittle surface and flake off like many experience using flaxseed oil. Always free same day shipping! Perfect seasoning every time for cast iron cookware. Crisbee is a proprietary cast iron seasoning blend of Soybean Oil, Beeswax, and Palm Oil. One 3.25oz Crisbee Puck included in tin. Free shipping.
feature_bullets: WHY CRISBEE CAST IRON SEASONING? Because the leaders in cast iron swear by the Crisbee brand to season their cast iron. From new cast iron skillets, to vintage cast iron skillets, they trust Crisbee to season their pans to perfection every time.
WHAT IS A CAST IRON SEASONING? A substantial cast iron seasoning keeps food from sticking to the cast iron, and protects the cast iron cookware.
Maintain a cleaner non-stick skillet. Excellent for initial seasoning and daily maintenance of cast iron. Protects cast iron cookware.
A little goes a long way. Very economical compared to seasoning cast iron cookware with oil.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED. Family owned and operated. Proudly made in the USA. Ships same day.
